name: Project A Research Corporation
description: Developer of a social trading network intended to create, share, discover and execute diverse trade ideas. The company's platform provides a social trading application that makes financial influencers manage portfolios with friends, offers trading strategies, and lets users get paid directly by their fans, enabling users to monetize their skills by sharing trade ideas and launching their own funds.
one_liner: Developer of a social trading network intended to create, share, discover and execute diverse trade ideas. The company's platform provides a social trading application that makes financial influencers manage portfolios with friends, offers trading strategies, and lets users get paid directly by their fans, enabling users to monetize their skills by sharing trade ideas and launching their own funds.
